item.title: "Extremely dangerous" Hurricane Melissa lashing Cuba after pounding Jamaica
item.description: Hurricane Melissa made landfall over eastern Cuba early Wednesday as an "extremely dangerous" Category 3 storm, forecasters said, after pummeling Jama...

item.title: Raid on gang in Rio leaves at least 64 people dead, including police officers
item.description: The police operation was one of the most violent in Brazil's recent history, with human rights organizations calling for investigations into the death...

item.title: 9/24: CBS Morning News
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel returns to air after suspension; CBS News speaks with leading researcher about White House autism claims.

item.title: Trump seems to acknowledge he can't run for a third term: "It's too bad"
item.description: President Trump appeared to concede Wednesday that he's not allowed to run for reelection in 2028, after teasing the idea on and off for months.

item.title: Hometown of jailed drug lord hit by drones, forcing residents to flee
item.description: Cartels and other criminal organizations in Mexico have increasingly used drones in attacks against rival groups or authorities.
